hero.name: Juan Emilio Elizondo
hero.description: Front End Developer with real experience creating web applications and systems. Specialized in React and Tailwind CSS, building clean, scalable, and user-oriented interfaces.

about.title: Professional Profile
about.intro: Front End Developer with real experience creating web applications and systems.
points: Experience in companies and projects in tourism, insurance, fitness, rental management, and stock management systems with sales.
Specialized in React and Tailwind CSS, creating clean, scalable, and user-oriented interfaces.
Active collaboration in multidisciplinary teams under agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban).
Passion for learning new technologies, integrating external services through APIs, and applying good programming practices.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Front End Developer (Contractor)
experience.description: Real estate management and stock management system projects
responsibilities: Development and maintenance of user interfaces with React + Tailwind CSS.
Integration with external APIs and backend systems (Java, Spring Boot, MySQL).
Participation in the design of complete business flows and UX optimization.
Collaboration in agile teams, meeting deadlines and responsibilities.
Experience leading and collaborating on real-world projects, making technical decisions alongside senior developers.
experience.realExperienceText: I have worked on projects in different sectors including tourism, insurance, fitness, rental management, and stock management systems with sales, always focusing on creating the best user experiences from the front end.

specialization.title: Specialization in React & Tailwind CSS
specialization.description: My main focus is on creating exceptional user interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS, always applying best practices and keeping up to date with the latest Front End development trends.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.otherProjectsDesc: Additional projects with live demos and available repositories
projects.confidentialNote: Demo and repository not available due to confidentiality agreement

featured.title: Invitarly
featured.description: Complete platform for creating and managing digital invitations for events. System with integrated payment gateway, event management, and administration panel.

featured.title: Real Estate Management System
featured.description: Creation of a web platform to manage contracts, properties, and users. Enterprise project under confidentiality agreement.

featured.title: Stock Management System with Sales
featured.description: Web application for inventory control, sales, and user roles (administrator, employee, customer).

featured.title: Fitness, Insurance, and Tourism Projects
featured.description: Participation in real projects, integrating frontend with backend, optimizing user experience and UI.
featured.note: See 'Other Projects' section for live demos

items.title: Full Stack Developer Certification
items.description: Certified Tech Developer program created in collaboration by Globant and Mercado Libre. Over 1500 hours of theoretical and practical instruction.

items.title: Full Stack Developer Bootcamp
items.description: Intensive 4-month program with collaborative projects in teams of up to 8 people.

items.title: Java, OOP, Spring Boot, and MySQL
items.description: Continuous training in backend technologies for better Front End integration.

items.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
items.description: Certificate in OOP fundamentals applied to Java.

items.title: Spring Boot
items.description: Certificate in building APIs with Spring Boot.

items.title: English Certification
items.description: English proficiency certification for international work.
